I keep getting a "please eject & reinsert the CD" message. done this for a few hours & nothing happening yet

any ideas folks?

Do note that most 2-cd bishoujo games like this one have the 1st CD for installing, and the 2nd for playing. If the game doesn't work and if you happen to use Daemon Tools, try mounting CD 2 in the 1st emulator.
